# bc

## Description


Clear the breakpoint with the specified index.
## Usage


```bash
usage: bc [-h] [which]

```
## Positional Arguments

|Positional Argument|Help|
| :--- | :--- |
|which|Index of the breakpoint to clear. (default: '*')|

## Optional Arguments

|Short|Long|Help|
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
|-h|--help|show this help message and exit|
